entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening then changing to wet snow mixed with rain after midnight. Local snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023
